description.value:
Anyone who tries to fire a Plasma weapon within 30 metres of this device suffers -30 to BS Tests to fire them. If they fail the BS Test with a number of DoF greater than their Ballistics Skull Bonus, the shoot veers off at a catastrophic angle and the weapon jams (or Overheats, if it has that quality).

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
